title: Add Support to use AD (LAPS feature) to obtain local Administrator login credentials
author: ksupan
body_snippet:
Add the ability to obtain local <computername>\Administrator account login credentials via LAPS (Local Administrator Password Solution).


## Expected Behavior
When specified by user, mRemoteNG will dynamically obtain and use local administrator credentials to make an RDP connection.


## Current Behavior
This would be a new feature - current connection options are to use global credentials, manually enter credentials, or import credentials from external file (CSV).

iterations.description: Feature request to integrate Microsoft LAPS (Local Administrator Password Solution) for retrieving local admin credentials from Active Directory, useful for IT admins managing domain-joined machines

notes:
AI triage (claude): Feature request to integrate Microsoft LAPS (Local Administrator Password Solution) for retrieving local admin credentials from Active Directory, useful for IT admins managing domain-joined machines
Approach: Add a LAPS credential provider that queries AD (ms-Mcs-AdmPwd or ms-LAPS-Password attribute) for the target host and injects the retrieved password into the connection at connect time. Requires LDAP query to AD using System.DirectoryServices, with caching and error handling for hosts not enrolled in LAPS.
